request.description: This function returns all addresses in your account. If you provide a companyID, system will only return the addresses registered for that company. Else, it will return all addresses in the account.
This function will create a new address record for a given company.
This function will return all cities registered under a given country. Note: Cities are system registered data and cannot be modified.
This function will return all countries. Note: Countries are system registered data and cannot be modified.
This function will return all auctions for a given company.

body.raw:
{
    "name" : "API GATEWAY EXAMPLE 1",
    "type" : 3,
    "date" : "2019-05-20",
    "time" : "13:00",
    "duration":60,
    "budget" : 0,
    "minimumChange":0,
    "currency" : "TRY",
    "agreementText" : "Agreement Text that bidders have to accept before participating in the auction.",
    "deliveryRequired" : 0,
    "deliveryDate":"2019-04-30",
    "reminder" : {
        "date":"2019-04-19",
        "frequency" : 24
    },
    "publish" : 1,
    "listPrice": 1,
    "auctionItems" : [
        {
            "categoryID" : "acf4a180-ae23-4673-854b-4dc3811b467b",
            "productID" : "c9b79f8f-7f6a-4689-8f42-0b4e8dbe5dda",
            "amount" : 10,
            "unit" : "Adet",
            "description" : "",
            "listPrice" : 0
        }
    ],
    "auctionConditions" : [
        {
            "name" : "Condition 1",
            "type" : 3,
            "required": true
        }
    ],
    "bidders" : [
        {
            "ID":"2e05b24b-f17d-4739-8e51-46afcc92677b",
        	"new": false
        }
    ],
    "bidderGroups" : [],
    "deliveryAddress" : "",
    "note" : "Please place your bids with VAT included prices.",
    "departmentID" : "8f41d06e-4322-4a69-a6d4-0acac37d64bf",
    "autoTimeExtension" : {
        "type" : 1,
        "margin" : 10,
        "duration" : 10
    },
    "bidChangeLimit" : 1,
    "requestDeliveryDateForItems" : 2,
    "visibleOffers" : 1,
    "visibleRank" : false,
    "transportType" : "",
    "paymentType" : "",
    "validUntilDate" : "2019-05-01",
    "bidLimit" : 0,
    "inviteMailBody" : "The content of the outgoing mail when the auction is published.",
    "inviteMailTitle" : "inviteMailTitle",
    "files" : []
}

request.description: This function will create a new auction.
This function will return all announcements made in a given auction.
This function will post a new announcement to a given auction. All announcements will be pushed to all bidders in real-time.
This function will return the bidders of a given auction.

This function will change the Auto Extend configurations of a given auction.
You can Turn ON/OFF or modify the extension rules.

This function will change the duration of a given auction.
Keep in mind that extend duration can be negative!
Example: 5 --> Adds 5 minutes to duration.
Example:-5 -->Subtracts 5 minutes from duration.

This function will terminate an Auction.
A notification will be pushed to all bidders in real-time.
This function will add a new file to auction files. Bidders will be able to see and download the file.

This function will remove a file from Auction Files.
Bidders will no longer be able to access this file.
This function will delete an offer from given bidder and an auction.
This function will publish a previously drafted auction. Bidders will be able to see and join the auction.

This function will generate an excel report of the given auction.
Return will be the ID of newly generated file. You can use files/get method to download the file.

This function will terminate a stage from a given auction.
Warning!!! Only use at Sealed and Enveloped Auction Types!

This function will start a stage for a given auction.
Warning!!!Only use at Sealed and Enveloped Auction Types.
This function will create a new stage to a given auction.
This function will delete a stage from a given auction.
This function will start the auction. A notification will be pushed to all bidders in real-time.
This function will return the details of a given auction.

request.description: This function will update a given auction.
This function will delete an auction.
This function will return all bidders of a given company.
This function will crate a new bidder at a given company.

This function will return all Bidder Groups of a given company.
A bidder group can be used to enable multiple bidders to participate in the same auction
without attaching each bidder.
This function will create a new bidder group.
This function will return the details of a given bidder group.
This function will update a given bidder group.
This function will delete a bidder group from a given company.
This function will return the details of a given Bidder.
This function will update a given bidder.
This function will delete a given Bidder from a given company.
This function will return all Categories.
This function will create a new category for a given company.
This function will return the details of a given category.
This function will update a given category.
This function will delete a given category.

This function will upload a file to Jetract Servers.
Returning data will be ID of newly created file.
Important:You need to pass, is_public,company_uuid and file in a form-data!
